extends CustomDialog

evaluateItem

private boolean evaluateItem(EquipmentCard equipmentItem,
                             Player victim)
Evaluates the selected item and enables or disables the Take Button depending on if the selected Equipment Item meets the Help Me Out Card's requirements.

Parameters:
equipmentItem - Equipment Item to evaluate
victim - Player who currently is carrying the item
Returns:
true if the item can be taken; false otherwise

tookItem

public boolean tookItem()
Returns whether or not the player successfully took an item.

Returns:
true if the player took an item; false otherwise
